Question: Foshan Shiding Technology Co., Ltd CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Foshan Shiding Technology Co., Ltd

CES 2024 Product Highlight:

- Introducing the latest smart home security system
- Features advanced AI facial recognition technology
- Equipped with 24/7 real-time monitoring and alerts
- Offers seamless integration with smart home devices
- Provides remote access and control via a user-friendly mobile app
Summary_cn:
佛山市视鼎科技有限公司

CES 2024产品亮点：

- 推出最新款智能家居安全系统
- 配备先进的人工智能人脸识别技术
- 提供全天候实时监控和警报功能
- 与智能家居设备无缝集成
- 通过用户友好的手机应用提供远程访问和控制
